distribution.text: Copyright 2024 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
lha was updated to fix one security issue.

This security issue was fixed:
- CVE-2016-1925: Buffer Overflow while parsing level0 and level1 headers (bsc#962528).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.title: Terms of use

notes.text: Integer underflow in header.c in lha allows remote attackers to have unspecified impact via a large header size value for the (1) level0 or (2) level1 header in a lha archive, which triggers a buffer overflow.
notes.title: Vulnerability description
